pages.text: $(thing)Sugar and Spice$() comes with several new $(item)Advancements$() to help give you new challenges.$(br2)Make sure to click on the $(item)Advancements$() button in the pause menu, or press the $(item)L$() key!$(br2)Also, you can now see what things are missing for advancements with multiple requirements by holding $(thing)Shift$().
